member.name: D3D11_TILE_SHAPE
member.summary: Describes the shape of a tile by specifying its dimensions.

member.name: D3D11_TILE_SHAPE.WidthInTexels
member.summary: The width in texels of the tile.

member.name: D3D11_TILE_SHAPE.HeightInTexels
member.summary: The height in texels of the tile.

member.name: D3D11_TILE_SHAPE.DepthInTexels
member.summary: The depth in texels of the tile.
